Name: Cross the Hell master
About the game: 【Game introduction】 'Cross the Hell master' is a 2D cartoon style platform jumping game. The protagonist can travel back and forth between the two worlds, using the different terrains of the two worlds to reach the destination. Traveling to another world will consume a certain amount of life force, and you must reach the destination before the life force is exhausted. 【Game Operation】 Movement: W S A D Change Camera: C Jump: SPACE Attack: L/LMB Change Dimension: P/RMB 【Story background】 Powerful Necromancer kidnapped your son to the Hell to make a death ritual. You chases him though you know to open the portal back to your world you have to sacrifice the life of a mortal whose soul will be trapped here forever... You have his lost MAGIC DAGGER which allows to cross multidimensional worlds by drain your life energy. Use it to get back your son!
